title: Leading mobile messengers in the U.S. 2019 , by users
yAxis: Number of monthly unique users in millions
summary: This is a bar chart representing Platform in the x axis and Number of monthly unique users in millions in the y axis.
The maximum Number of monthly unique users in millions 106.4 is found at Platform Facebook Messenger and the minimum is found at WeChat where Number of monthly unique users in millions is 1.48.
The difference of Number of monthly unique users in millions between the highest and lowest Platform is 104.92.
